data.title: Battles of the Seven Years' War
data.meta_description: Battles of the Seven Years' War. GitHub Gist: instantly share code, notes, and snippets.
data.text:
This is dataset features information on the battles in the Seven Years' War as displayed on Wikipedia. Each battle has various attributes, including combatants, location, time, and theater of war. Dataset is inspired by Tomek's Battles of Hundred Year's War.

List of Attributes:

Name: Categorical

Theater: Categorical

Date: Ordinal

Year: Ordinal

Combatant: Categorical

Comebatant2: Categorical

State/Location of Action

Outcome: Categorical

Questions/Task:

Is there a way to show the worldwide scale of the war?

How did all of the different battle theaters play their part in this conflict?

Which location saw the most of the conflict?

(With some extra data)

Which battles were most fundamental to the war effort?

Is it possible to see the development and progress of the war visual? (visually see France's defeat)

This dataset definitely needs some cleaning and improvement; however, I think it could lead to an interesting visualization.
